title: Development of eco-friendly biofilms by utilizing microcrystalline cellulose extract from banana pseudo-stem
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ishmam Haque Sachcha, Kushal Paddar, Minhajul Matin Minar, Latifur Rahman, S.M. Kamrul Hasan, Md Akhtaruzzaman, Mir Tuhin Billah, Sabina Yasmin
